actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

official_title: To amend the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978 to remove the limitation on appropriations for land acquisition in the Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area.

summary.text: Amends the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978 to remove the limitation on the authorization of appropriations for land acquisition within the boundaries of the Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area, California.

titles.title: To amend the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978 to remove the limitation on appropriations for land acquisition in the Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area.
